descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Floor Plan 2 is a comedy adventure inspired by escape rooms, packed with more puzzles than you can fit in an elevator.

On your first day of work, the boss sends you to find a lost treasure that will turn the company's fortunes around. And good news: it's somewhere in the building! Just use the elevator down the hall. By the way, each floor is a gateway to another world, nobody speaks your language, and time and space are fluid. Good luck!

 🏆 Nominated for multiple VR Game of the Year awards

⭐️ "A Henson-esque Marvel" - Upload VR

⭐️"This is one of the best puzzle games in VR." - A Wolf in VR

⭐️ "I absolutely adore this game." - The Escape Roomer

[media]

# HILARIOUS, MIND-BENDING PUZZLES
Use your elevator to explore a series of interconnected escape rooms. Step out onto each floor, meet bizarre characters, and unravel their secrets. Revisit completed floors to find new, remixed challenges waiting for you.

[media]

# HAND PRESENTS
Find lost critters hidden throughout the building to earn hand presents, transforming your hands in all sorts of unexpected ways!

[media]

# 6+ HOURS OF HANDCRAFTED GAMEPLAY
Filled with critically-acclaimed puzzles and memorable "aha!" moments that respect your time. Now includes the Backside Story expansion!

[media]

# EVEN BETTER ON QUEST 3
Built exclusively for VR, comfortable for everyone, and updated with new and improved graphics for Quest 3!

Developed with love by the small but mighty Turbo Button team in Los Angeles. Join us at discord.turbo-button.com!
